com.github.restdriver.clientdriver

Interface RequestMatcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRequestMatcher

    public interface RequestMatcher
    Interface for classes whose responsibility is to match incoming Http requests with expected ClientDriverRequests.
    Author:
    mjg

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isMatch(RealRequest realRequest, ClientDriverRequest expectedRequest)
      Checks for a match between a real RealRequest and an expected ClientDriverRequest.

    • Method Detail

      • isMatch

        boolean isMatch(RealRequest realRequest,
              ClientDriverRequest expectedRequest)
        Checks for a match between a real RealRequest and an expected ClientDriverRequest. This implementation is as strict as it can be with exact matching for Strings, but can also use regular expressions in the form of Patterns.
        Parameters:
        realRequest - The real request RealRequest
        expectedRequest - The expected ClientDriverRequest
        Returns:
        True if there is a match, falsetto otherwise.
